gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Heat 118, Bulls 100
gameRecap.excerpt: The Heat defeated the Bulls, 118-100. Bam Adebayo recorded 23 points, 11 rebounds, and six assists for the Heat, with Duncan Robinson adding 22 points and two assists in the victory. Coby White tallied 20 points, six rebounds, and three assists for the Bulls in the losing effort. The Heat improve to 9-5 in the regular season, while the Bulls fall to 5-10.
